description: Try our easy to follow Marbled Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Baking,Easter,Peanut free
name: Marbled Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat butter and sugar together using electric beaters until smooth and creamy. Beat in egg and vanilla.

Sift flour and baking powder together and stir into butter mixture. Knead dough on a lightly floured surface until smooth. Divide in half. Roll out dough between 2 sheets of baking paper until 4mm thick. Place onto baking trays and chill for 30 minutes.

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cut out biscuit shapes using an eggshaped cutter. Carefully transfer to lined trays, leaving space between each. Re-roll scraps, chilling if dough becomes too soft to work with.
Bake for about 12 minutes or until edges are golden. Cool on trays for 5 minutes then transfer to wire racks and cool completely.

To make the marble icing, lightly whisk egg white in a medium bowl until loosened and foamy. Gradually whisk in icing sugar until smooth, then whisk briskly for a few minutes until glossy. Add water, 1 tsp at a time, until thick enough for drizzling.

Working with 23 tbs icing at a time, place onto 4 saucers. Cover remaining with plastic wrap to prevent a crust forming. Add a few drops of food colouring to each plate and swirl through with a toothpick.

Press one biscuit topdown into icing, then remove by lifting one side first. Keeping the biscuit level, shake sideways to remove excess. Turn glazed side up, wipe edge and place on wire racks to set. Repeat with remaining biscuits.
